main event: The observer sighted an object that was shaped like a dome and had the middle blue and the rims white. The object was brighter than any fluorescent light.
interesting points: The object was a reddish glow or circle behind a cloud at one time.
The observer had reported seeing a similar object in the past before.
The police department stated that they had not received any similar reports of unusual aerial objects in the area.
The object was described as having flashing lights that moved slowly and quickly in different directions, sometimes appearing as 3-4 objects moving together and then separating.
The observer was an interaist for young people in the phenomenon of the existence and operation of strange objects, and had seen strange things above their home before.
sighted object: a dome-shaped object with a blue middle and white rims, brighter than a fluorescent light
